<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both the Instructions are of Vector Type and any of the element</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dxilopbuilder-cpp-/#a3fe8fcf1f03e5da864eb86be303a3216a0bfbc695c285082c59ed77069aafbfae">I1</a>-&gt;getType()-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp; I2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each interesting use I of PN, find an Instruction BEUser that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performs the same operation as I on BEInst and whose other operands,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if any, can also be rematerialized in OtherBB. We stop when we find the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first such Instruction BEUser. This is because once BEUser is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rematerialized in OtherBB, we may find more such &quot;fixup&quot; opportunities</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in this block. So, we&#39;ll start over again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : PNUsers) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumOperands = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getNumOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Take operands of each PNUser one by one and try to find DepChain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with every operand of the BEUser. If any of the operands of BEUser</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has DepChain with current operand of the PNUser, break the matcher</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop. Keep doing this for Every PNUser operand. If PNUser operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not have DepChain with any of the BEUser operand, break the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer matcher loop, mark the BEUser as null and reset the ReuseCandidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This ensures that DepChain exist for all the PNUser operand with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BEUser operand. This also ensures that DepChains are independent of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the positions in PNUser and BEUser.</span></CodeLine>
